item.description: Structure Fire; INC#0036; 01:40AM; 12250 W Ventura Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3dIDBY4; Studio City; FIRE NOW OUT: firefighters arrived to find an outside fire which extended into a 2 story commercial (in a row of commercials). Firefighters had smoke inside the structure and it took time as they investigated to find the fire which was located in the subfloor between the two floors. There was also residual smoke in the large attic which had to be throughly investigated to ensure there was no remaining fire. 40 firefighters achieved the knockdown in one hour and six mins with no injuries reported. The 9-1-1 call was received at 12:34 AM. No further details. ; FS 78; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC10 BC14 E102 E260 E27 E278 E289 E86 E97 EM14 RA78 T60 T78 T89; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Train vs Ped - FATALITY; INC#1560; 07:16PM; 9449 N San Fernando Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3fgxkTz; Sun Valley; Train struck a pedestrian on the tracks and the patient was determined dead on scene. There are no injuries reported on the train. The train is reported to be Amtrack. No further details.; FS 77; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC12 E289 E298 E7 E77 E89 EM14 HR3 RA77 RA81 RA89 T89 T98 UR88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update Traffic; INC#1222; 05:24PM; Eb 105 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3S956cb; Westchester; Final patient count: a total of eight patients were transported with 4 in ALS paramedic ambulances and 4 in BLS EMT ambulances. There were no critically injured patients. All ages/genders not available. All questions regarding the collision are referred to CHP Log # 1906 No further details. ; FS 51; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E205 E295 E5 E95 EM1 EM11 EM14 EM15 RA43 RA5 RA51 RA59 RA63 RA837 RA866 RA892 RA94 T5 T95; CH4; 13; Margaret Stewart

Traffic; INC#1222; 03:56PM; Eb 105 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3S956cb; Westchester; Five vehicle collision with preliminary reports of eight patients being evaluated (unknown how many will require hospital transport at this time). One additional task force requested to assist with the operation. This will significantly impact traffic on the 105 FY x 405 FY. Commuters are advised to follow CHP traffic alerts for updates. Log #1903 #trafficalert; FS 51; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E295 E5 EM1 EM11 EM14 RA43 RA5 RA51 RA63 RA837 RA866 RA892 T95; CH4; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0382; 08:17AM; 1110 S Main St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3r8m0vr; Downtown; KNOCKDOWN: Firefighters located a contents fire only (no extension into the structure itself) and quickly extinguished it (in 15 mins, prior to the arrival of the additionally requested units) while additional firefighters investigated and found no extension into the shared attic. A primary and secondary search of the building found no occupants. ; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM20 CM22 E10 E11 E202 E203 E210 E211 E215 E5 E9 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA14 RA17 SQ21 T10 T15 T2 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0382; 08:02AM; 1110 S Main St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3r8m0vr; Downtown; One story row of commercial units (vacant) with smoke showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E10 E11 E210 E211 E9 EM1 RA17 SQ21 T10 T9; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Update Traffic - FATALITIES; INC#1584; 08:37PM; 1753 N Avalon Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3SoeKHA; Wilmington; Patient update: Sadly both patients (one in the auto fire and one trapped in 2nd vehicle) were determined dead on scene. Age / gender unknown at this time. All media queries are referred to LAPD Traffic Division Inc# 4153 and LA County Coroner Office for the investigation. No further details.; FS 38; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 E238 E285 E85 HR3 RA101 T38 T85; CH4; 13; Margaret Stewart

Traffic - FATALITY; INC#1584; 08:16PM; 1753 N Avalon Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3SoeKHA; Wilmington; Firefighters arrived to find a traffic collision with auto fire out (no fire upon arrival). One person determined deceased on scene and one person requiring extrication (from which vehicles is unknown at this time). No further patient information available. An extrication operation is underway. Any questions regarding the collision are referred to LAPD Traffic Division Inc# 4153; FS 38; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 E238 E285 E85 HR3 RA101 T38 T85; CH4; 13; Margaret Stewart

Grass Fire; INC#1250; 05:13PM; 10420 W Northvale Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DIWVyZ; Cheviot Hills; Three engines are handling a grass fire at the rail road tracks. The Expo line is shut down and CHP will be closing the WB 10 Overland off ramp. Follow the appropriate agencies for further traffic updates. No injuries reported and no structures threatened. No further updates are anticipated.; FS 43; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; E43 E58 E62; CH7; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Update Traffic - FATALITY; INC#0288; 07:27AM; Eb 105 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3oxg0JN; Vermont Vista; Patient update: One patient was trapped between vehicles (not inside) and is being transported in critical condition. One patient (inside vehicle) determined deceased on scene. 5 additional patients were evaluated and only one will be transported with minor injuries. No ages/genders available. Any further questions are referred to CHP Log 431 for the investigation.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 BC4 E264 E266 E57 E64 E65 E79 EM1 EM13 EM4 EM5 HR3 RA14 RA15 RA264 RA266 RA46 RA64 RA79 RA866 RA95 T64 T66; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart
